data.text: @TracyBethHoeg @ifihadastick The next cache of FOIA FDA/pfizer safety data is out. Particular concern? page 30. How are we still mandating blanket vaccines for college students? https://t.co/AWZPpc7h62

@TracyBethHoeg @ifihadastick Could you answer the questions in this thread?
https://t.co/qABJwgglRy
@NathanCarmon @TracyBethHoeg @ifihadastick CDC, NIH is not forthcoming and honest about data. If they even did the studies in the first place.

@trford3 @ifihadastick Tom, what specifically do you have in mind? My husband is a bone marrow transplant physician & this topic dear to my heart-normalcy for as many as possible while giving needed tools/advice to protect those at high risk. What should be added beyond what is done for other diseases?
@trford3 @TracyBethHoeg @ifihadastick How do those at risk not have the tools to protect themselves?
@trford3 @TracyBethHoeg @ifihadastick How about those at risk figure out after 2 years to do what's best for them.

@TracyBethHoeg @ifihadastick Instead of promoting #UrgencyOfNormal, how about you advocate for #UrgencyOfAccommodation. As in, we can ALL get back to normal if everyone who is at greater risk from covid has the accommodations they need to offer them close to the same level of protection as everyone else.
@TracyBethHoeg @ifihadastick Why no pediatric seroprev studies in the US?
